name: Bergelmir, the Giant of Absolute Coldness
text:
Break: Put this card into your hand.
While this card is a summon spell, players cannot chase cards with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: This card cannot be targeted by spells with total cost 4 or less or abilities on a card with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: At the end of your recovery phase, pay UU2 or put this card on the bottom of your main deck.
Continuous: When this card attacks, rest two target resonators in your opponent's field, They cannot recover in their controller's next recovery phase.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
